author: dgaudet
msg: suexec doesn't close the log file so CGIs could write to it
Reviewed by:	Roy, Randy, Chuck
Submitted by:	Marc
Obtained from:

author: fielding
msg: The addition of <Location> and <File> directives made the
sub_req_lookup_simple() function bogus, so we now handle
the special cases directly.  The patch affects mainly
multiviews into a file that matches a <Files> section.
Submitted by: Dean Gaudet
Reviewed by: Roy Fielding

author: fielding
msg: Constify the interface to table_do in order to make it clear that the
passed routine cannot change the table.
Submitted by: Dean Gaudet
Reviewed by: Roy Fielding

author: fielding
msg: Use err_headers_out for Vary and Alternates, since the new
send_http_header() now sends them for all responses.
Submitted by: Petr Lampa
Reviewed by: Roy Fielding, Dean Gaudet

author: fielding
msg: Try to log where the server is dumping core when a fatal
signal is received.
Submitted by: Ken Coar
Reviewed by: Roy, Chuck, Jim, Randy, Dean
